test_cases.objective: Verify that the batch control system is properly configured according to ISA-88 standards and URS-DCS-003 requirements.
prerequisites: DCS system is installed and powered on

test_steps.action: Navigate to the recipe management interface and verify version control functionality
test_steps.expected_result: Recipe versions are displayed correctly and can be selected

test_steps.action: Initiate a test batch and verify phase logic execution
test_steps.expected_result: Batch progresses through phases according to configured logic

test_steps.action: Generate a batch report and verify genealogy tracking
test_steps.expected_result: Report contains complete batch genealogy information

test_steps.action: Simulate an exception condition and verify operator intervention handling
test_steps.expected_result: System properly handles exceptions and allows operator intervention

acceptance_criteria: All recipe management functions operate as specified
Batch phases execute according to configured logic
Batch reports contain complete and accurate information
Exception handling functions properly
data_integrity_requirements: Electronic signatures for critical parameters
Audit trail for all batch operations

test_cases.objective: Verify that the alarm management system is properly configured according to rationalized alarm philosophy and URS-DCS-004 requirements.
prerequisites: DCS system is installed and powered on

test_steps.action: Trigger a critical alarm and verify priority classification and response
test_steps.expected_result: Critical alarm is displayed with correct priority and requires acknowledgment

test_steps.action: Initiate startup sequence and verify alarm suppression functionality
test_steps.expected_result: Configured alarms are suppressed during startup sequence

test_steps.action: Trigger multiple alarms simultaneously to test flood suppression
test_steps.expected_result: System properly suppresses alarm floods according to configuration

test_steps.action: Access alarm performance metrics and verify data collection
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm performance metrics are available and accurate

acceptance_criteria: Alarms are properly classified by priority
Alarm suppression functions as configured during startup/shutdown
Flood suppression prevents alarm storms
Performance metrics are available and accurate
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for alarm acknowledgments
Historical alarm data storage

test_cases.objective: Verify that the batch control system is properly configured according to ISA-88 standards and URS-DCS-003 requirements.
prerequisites: System is installed and powered on
Batch control software is loaded and operational

test_steps.action: Navigate to the batch control configuration interface in the DCS.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch control configuration interface is accessible and displays all configured recipes.

test_steps.action: Select a test recipe and verify its version control settings.
test_steps.expected_result: Recipe version control is enabled and previous versions are archived.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test batch and monitor phase logic execution.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch executes according to phase logic with proper equipment arbitration.

test_steps.action: Simulate an exception condition and verify operator intervention capabilities.
test_steps.expected_result: System properly handles exceptions and allows for operator intervention as configured.

acceptance_criteria: All configured recipes are accessible and properly version controlled
Batch execution follows ISA-88 phase logic standards
Exception handling functions as specified in URS-DCS-003
data_integrity_requirements: All batch records must be complete and unaltered
Electronic signatures must be properly implemented

test_cases.objective: Verify that the alarm management system is properly configured according to rationalized alarm philosophy and URS-DCS-004 requirements.
prerequisites: System is installed and powered on
Alarm management software is loaded and operational

test_steps.action: Access the alarm management configuration interface in the DCS.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm configuration interface is accessible and displays all configured alarms.

test_steps.action: Verify alarm priority classifications for critical process parameters.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarms are properly classified according to the rationalized alarm philosophy.

test_steps.action: Simulate an alarm storm condition and verify flood suppression functionality.
test_steps.expected_result: System properly suppresses non-critical alarms during alarm storm conditions.

test_steps.action: Initiate a startup sequence and verify alarm suppression during startup.
test_steps.expected_result: Configured alarms are properly suppressed during startup sequences.

acceptance_criteria: All alarms are properly classified according to priority
Alarm flood suppression functions as specified
Startup/shutdown alarm suppression works as configured
data_integrity_requirements: Alarm records must be complete and unaltered
Alarm configuration changes must be properly documented

test_cases.objective: To verify that the batch control system is correctly configured according to ISA-88 batch standard and URS-DCS-003 requirements.

test_steps.action: Access the batch control system interface.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch control interface is accessible and displays correctly.

test_steps.action: Create a new batch recipe and configure phase logic.
test_steps.expected_result: Recipe is created successfully with correct phase logic.

test_steps.action: Simulate a batch process execution.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch process executes according to configured recipe and phase logic.

acceptance_criteria: Batch control system operates as per ISA-88 standards
All configured phases execute correctly
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all batch data is accurately recorded

test_cases.objective: To validate that the alarm management system is configured according to the rationalized alarm philosophy and URS-DCS-004 requirements.

test_steps.action: Access the alarm management system interface.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm management interface is accessible and displays correctly.

test_steps.action: Trigger a high-priority alarm and verify its classification.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm is correctly classified as high-priority.

test_steps.action: Simulate an alarm storm and verify flood suppression.
test_steps.expected_result: Flood suppression is activated correctly to prevent alarm storms.

acceptance_criteria: Alarm management system operates as per rationalized alarm philosophy
All alarms are correctly classified and suppressed
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all alarm data is accurately recorded

test_cases.objective: Verify that the batch control system is properly configured according to ISA-88 standards and URS-DCS-003 requirements.
prerequisites: DCS system is installed and powered on

test_steps.action: Navigate to the batch control configuration interface in the DCS.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch control configuration interface is accessible and displays all configured recipes.

test_steps.action: Select a test recipe and initiate a batch run.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch run initiates successfully with proper phase logic execution.

test_steps.action: Simulate an exception condition during batch execution.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly handles the exception with proper operator intervention prompts.

test_steps.action: Generate a batch report after completion.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch report is generated with complete genealogy tracking and all required data fields.

acceptance_criteria: All configured recipes are accessible and executable
Phase logic executes correctly according to ISA-88 standards
Exception handling functions as designed
Batch reports contain all required information with proper genealogy tracking
data_integrity_requirements: Electronic signatures for critical parameters
Audit trail for all batch operations
Data backup and recovery procedures

test_cases.objective: Validate that the alarm management system is configured according to the rationalized alarm philosophy and meets URS-DCS-004 requirements.
prerequisites: Test scenarios prepared for alarm testing

test_steps.action: Access the alarm management configuration interface.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm configuration interface displays all configured alarms with proper priorities.

test_steps.action: Trigger a critical alarm condition and verify response.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm is displayed within 1 second with correct priority and annunciation.

test_steps.action: Simulate an alarm flood condition (10+ alarms in 10 seconds).
test_steps.expected_result: Flood suppression activates and only critical alarms are displayed.

test_steps.action: Generate an alarm performance report for the test period.
test_steps.expected_result: Report contains all required metrics including alarm rates, response times, and suppression events.

acceptance_criteria: All alarms are properly classified and prioritized
Alarm response time meets 1-second requirement
Flood suppression functions as designed
Alarm performance metrics are correctly captured and reported
data_integrity_requirements: Alarm history retention
Audit trail for alarm configuration changes
Secure storage of alarm records

test_cases.test_name: Verify Batch Control Configuration Compliance with ISA-88
test_cases.objective: To ensure the batch control system is correctly configured according to the ISA-88 batch standard, including recipe management, phase logic, and batch reporting.

test_steps.action: Access the batch control system and navigate to recipe management.
test_steps.expected_result: Recipe management interface is accessible and displays version control options.

test_steps.action: Create a new batch recipe and configure phase logic.
test_steps.expected_result: Phase logic is correctly configured with equipment arbitration.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch process and monitor batch reporting.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch reporting includes genealogy tracking and exception handling.

acceptance_criteria: Batch control system complies with ISA-88 standards
All configured features function as expected
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all batch data is accurately recorded and traceable

test_cases.objective: To validate that the alarm management system is configured according to the rationalized alarm philosophy, including priority classification and flood suppression.

test_steps.action: Access the alarm management system and review alarm priorities.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarms are classified correctly as Critical, High, Medium, or Low.

test_steps.action: Simulate an alarm storm and observe flood suppression.
test_steps.expected_result: Flood suppression activates to prevent alarm storms.

test_steps.action: Review alarm performance metrics.
test_steps.expected_result: Performance metrics indicate effective alarm management.

acceptance_criteria: Alarm management system complies with rationalized alarm philosophy
All configured features function as expected
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all alarm data is accurately recorded

test_cases.objective: To verify that the batch control system is correctly configured according to ISA-88 standards and URS-DCS-003 requirements.

test_steps.action: Load a test recipe into the batch control system.
test_steps.expected_result: Recipe loads successfully with all parameters visible.

test_steps.action: Execute the batch process using the loaded recipe.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch process executes according to the defined phase logic and equipment arbitration.

test_steps.action: Generate a batch report after completion.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch report includes all required data with genealogy tracking.

acceptance_criteria: Batch process executes without errors
All phases complete as expected
Batch report is accurate and complete
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all batch data is accurately recorded
Verify data integrity during recipe execution

test_cases.objective: To validate that the alarm management system is configured according to the rationalized alarm philosophy and URS-DCS-004 requirements.

test_steps.action: Trigger a test alarm in the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm is displayed with the correct priority and classification.

test_steps.action: Simulate an alarm storm by triggering multiple alarms.
test_steps.expected_result: Flood suppression activates to prevent alarm overload.

test_steps.action: Review alarm performance metrics.
test_steps.expected_result: Metrics indicate effective alarm management and response.

acceptance_criteria: Alarms are correctly classified and prioritized
Flood suppression functions as expected
Performance metrics meet defined criteria
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all alarm data is accurately recorded
Verify data integrity during alarm events

test_cases.objective: Verify that the batch control system is correctly configured according to ISA-88 standards and URS-DCS-003 requirements.

test_steps.action: Access the batch control configuration interface.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch control configuration interface is accessible.

test_steps.action: Verify recipe management configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Recipe management is configured with version control.

test_steps.action: Check phase logic configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Phase logic is configured with equipment arbitration.

test_steps.action: Validate batch reporting configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch reporting is configured with genealogy tracking.

test_steps.action: Test exception handling configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Exception handling is configured with operator intervention.

acceptance_criteria: Batch control system meets all URS-DCS-003 requirements
Configuration matches ISA-88 standards
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all batch data is accurately captured and stored
Verify data integrity controls are in place

test_cases.objective: Verify that the alarm management system is correctly configured according to URS-DCS-004 requirements.

test_steps.action: Access the alarm management configuration interface.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm management configuration interface is accessible.

test_steps.action: Verify priority-based alarm classification.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarms are classified as Critical, High, Medium, Low.

test_steps.action: Check alarm suppression during startup/shutdown sequences.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm suppression is configured correctly.

test_steps.action: Validate flood suppression configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Flood suppression is configured to prevent alarm storms.

test_steps.action: Test performance metrics for alarm effectiveness.
test_steps.expected_result: Performance metrics are configured and functional.

acceptance_criteria: Alarm management system meets all URS-DCS-004 requirements
Configuration matches rationalized alarm philosophy
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all alarm data is accurately captured and stored
Verify data integrity controls are in place

test_cases.objective: Ensure control loop execution is deterministic with a 100ms cycle time as specified in URS-DCS-016.

test_steps.action: Initiate control loop execution and monitor cycle time.
test_steps.expected_result: Control loop cycle time should not exceed 100ms.

acceptance_criteria: Control loop cycle time is within 100ms
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure accurate cycle time measurements

test_cases.objective: Validate that operator interface response time does not exceed 2 seconds as specified in URS-DCS-017.

test_steps.action: Perform various operator actions and measure response time.
test_steps.expected_result: Operator interface response time should not exceed 2 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Operator interface response time is within 2 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure accurate response time measurements

test_cases.test_name: Verify Batch Control Configuration with ISA-88 Standard
test_cases.objective: To ensure the batch control system is correctly configured according to ISA-88 standards, including recipe management, phase logic, and exception handling.
prerequisites: System is installed and powered on

test_steps.action: Create a new batch recipe with version control enabled.
test_steps.expected_result: Recipe is successfully created and version is recorded.

test_steps.action: Execute a batch process using the created recipe.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch process executes according to the defined phase logic.

test_steps.action: Simulate an exception during batch execution and verify operator intervention.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly handles the exception and allows operator intervention.

acceptance_criteria: Recipe management functions correctly
Phase logic executes as defined
Exception handling is effective
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all batch data is accurately recorded
Maintain audit trail for all operator actions

test_cases.objective: To verify that the alarm management system is configured correctly, including priority classification, suppression, and performance metrics.
prerequisites: System is installed and powered on

test_steps.action: Trigger a critical alarm and verify its classification.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm is correctly classified as critical and displayed to the operator.

test_steps.action: Simulate a startup sequence and verify alarm suppression.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarms are suppressed during the startup sequence as configured.

test_steps.action: Generate multiple alarms simultaneously and verify flood suppression.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents alarm storms by suppressing non-critical alarms.

acceptance_criteria: Alarms are correctly classified
Alarm suppression works as intended
Flood suppression is effective
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all alarm events are logged
Maintain audit trail for alarm management actions

test_cases.test_name: Verify Batch Control Configuration Compliance with ISA-88
test_cases.objective: To ensure that the batch control system is correctly configured according to the ISA-88 batch standard, including recipe management, phase logic, batch reporting, and exception handling.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch process using a predefined recipe.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch process starts correctly with all phases executing as per the recipe.

test_steps.action: Simulate an exception during the batch process.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly handles the exception with appropriate operator intervention prompts.

test_steps.action: Complete the batch process and generate a batch report.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch report is generated with accurate genealogy tracking and all required data fields.

acceptance_criteria: Batch process executes all phases correctly
Exceptions are handled appropriately
Batch report contains all required data
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all batch data is accurately recorded
Verify data integrity in batch reports

test_cases.objective: To verify that the alarm management system is configured according to the rationalized alarm philosophy, ensuring proper alarm classification, suppression, and performance metrics.

test_steps.action: Trigger a critical alarm in the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm is correctly classified as critical and displayed to the operator.

test_steps.action: Simulate an alarm storm by triggering multiple alarms simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: System implements flood suppression to prevent alarm storms.

test_steps.action: Review alarm performance metrics.
test_steps.expected_result: Performance metrics accurately reflect alarm effectiveness and response times.

acceptance_criteria: Alarms are correctly classified and displayed
Flood suppression prevents alarm storms
Performance metrics are accurate
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all alarm data is accurately recorded
Verify data integrity in alarm performance metrics
